Text:
Usually ASAP and IMMERSE don't have "Gross Pixelation Errors" like this.
@ 34:31 of this episode, there's a major glitch. Possibly broadcast related.
I will be looking for a WEB-DL soonest.
.
AVIGUY

THANKS for the fair warning and your honesty!! And THANKS for the .avi!! Most uploaders take the attitude that just because it's free and they have a skull by their name that they can upload shit with no warning and we should be grateful for their turdish upload. Again, THANK YOU, and the glitches you mention are not too terribly bad. Keep up the good work, you have earned my trust!! Peace, Love, Respect, DrScott
